post.title: IFC 3D Model Markup
post.summary: Markups functionality over IFC model using IFC.js + React + React Three Fiber
post.socialMediaDescription:
Add markups to your models to improve your team's workflow and
    the model's usability. Easy to use and simple to integrate,
    markups will help you throughout the different stages of your
    project.
post.description:
In this demo you can see how we can add markers to an IFC 3D model to track issues on any part of the project.

Add markups to your models to improve your team's workflow and the model's usability. Easy to use and simple to integrate, markups will help you throughout the different stages of your project.

  • Improve your workflows by adding markups to your model in the browser.
  • For you it only takes the click of a button to get started, we take care of the rest.
  • Create a fully interactive scenario.
